comment.message: Snakes reappears on the opposite side when traveling through a border. Disables border.movesPerArenaShrink.

How many moves the snakes can make before the playable area shrinks.
Special values:
-1: Disabled, area will not shrink.
 0: The playable area's current width. Shrinks faster and faster.

AppleLess:
Sets rules.startLength to infinity and border.movesPerArenaShrink to -1.
FourSymmetry:
When one is eaten, all get renewed.
FourRandom_asymmetric:
When one is eaten, all get renewed.
OneRandomPerWorm_asymmetric:
When one is eaten, only it get renewed.

Note:
MostPoints is locked to defeatedWorms:Solid, due to otherwise last standing worm could play safe and collect eatables once its' opponents are gone.
